definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The challenge is the boundary of personalisation and privacy.
sentences.chinese: 挑战在于个性化和隐私之间的分界线。

sentences.english: That means you can start personalizing a new service really fast.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着你可以开始个性化一项新的服务，真快。

sentences.english: Many farm also actively explore some personalized service to appeal to consumers.
sentences.chinese: 不少农家乐还积极开拓一些个性化服务吸引消费者。

sentences.english: Therefore, my subject will finish the search engine based on industry.
sentences.chinese: 果彼课题完败了基于行业的个性化搜索引擎。

sentences.english: They need specific advice on how to protect their heart.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要关于如何保护心脏的个性化建议。

sentences.english: A personalized vacation awaits at Quinta Real Aguascalientes.
sentences.chinese: 一个个性化的假期等在阿瓜斯卡连特斯的。

sentences.english: They are considering ways to personalize the exams to minimize cheating.
sentences.chinese: 他们也在考虑提供个性化考试来减少作弊。

sentences.english: The first step in personalizing a website is often adding a company logo. Perform the following steps to add a company logo
sentences.chinese: 网站个性化的第一步通常是添加一个公司的徽标。

sentences.english: Perhaps sotsukon is the ultimate climax of that individualization.
sentences.chinese: 也许“卒婚”是这种个性化的终极表现。

sentences.english: Some received training on individualizing care. Others did not.
sentences.chinese: 他们之中有些接受过个性化诊疗训练，有些则没有。

sentences.english: The whole liquor-making industry consumers have to meet the personalized needs of congenital conditions.
sentences.chinese: 整个白酒业具有满足消费者个性化需求的先天条件。

sentences.english: In order to work towards adaptable personalized context-aware services, we need to elaborate the requirements.
sentences.chinese: 为了接纳个性化环境敏感服务，我们需要提升需求。

sentences.english: Objective Discussing the method of individuation community intervention to the Agedness Hypertension.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨老年高血压病的个性化社区干预措施。

sentences.english: A person is character personified only if he has enough credibility.
sentences.chinese: 如果有足够的诚信，品质就会个性化。

sentences.english: It includes personalization reading teaching psychological environment and physical environment.
sentences.chinese: 它包括个性化阅读教学心理环境和物理环境。

sentences.english: The students' individualization is the important feature of vocal music teaching.
sentences.chinese: 学生个性化是声乐教学的重要特征。
